name: Bad Influence (Challenger)
description:
- My first attempt on making a game. This game was made according to Shaun Spaldin

's "My First Platformer" tutorial series.  For me, this was just an opportunity to learn the basics of Game Maker whilst making a fun little game and I have to say that Shaun's tutorial, well... let's just say I never watch tutorials and I even hit like in most of his platformer series videos. The basic features are the same but I believe, I've added some nice touches. :)

- There are 5 Endings that the player can get:

1 -  "Bad Ending" (Just kill a bunch of people for no reason)

2 - "Just an Ending" (Kill no one, while running around with a gun, like a maniac)

3 - "GoodEnding" (Kill no one. Just have a nice walk in the park)

4 - " Sweet Ending" (Get The Sweet Item)

5 - "GOW Ending" (Kill. EVERYONE)

Cheat "Codes"

(If you don't feel like doing it the normal way)

  ( Number Keys )

- 1 Enable/Disable  Extreme Movespeed

- 2 Enable/Disable  Rapid Fire 

- 3 Enable/Disable  Infinite Lives 

Hope you enjoy!

!! || IMPORTANT || !!

- I DO NOT OWN MOST OF THE ASSETS USED ON THIS GAME.

- I AM NOT, IN ANY WAY, MAKING A PROFIT FROM THIS GAME. I JUST WANT TO SHARE MY EXPERIENCE OF MAKING MY FIRST GAME.

- THIS IS JUST A "TUTORIAL" GAME, I MADE WHILST LEARNING SOME OF THE BASICS OF GAME DEVELOPMENT. 

- ALPHA VERSION. FEEL FREE TO COMMENT IF YOU ENCOUNTER ANY BUGS          (Which you probably will)

- BIG THANK YOU TO SHAUN SPALDIN FOR HIS AMAZING PLATFORMER TUTORIAL SERIES.
